trans-unit.source: How to: Project a New Type (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 如何︰ 投影新類型 (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic) |Microsoft 文件

trans-unit.source: How to: Project a New Type (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 如何︰ 投影新類型 (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: Other examples in this section have shown queries that return results as <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of `string`, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of `int`.
trans-unit.target: 本章節中的其他範例顯示的查詢會傳回結果，當做<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>的<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>，<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>的`string`，和<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>的`int`。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: These are common result types, but they are not appropriate for every scenario.
trans-unit.target: 這些是常見的結果型別，但這些型別不適用於每個案例。

trans-unit.source: In many cases you will want your queries to return an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of some other type.
trans-unit.target: 在許多情況下，您會想要傳回查詢<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>某個其他型別的。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to instantiate objects in the `Select` clause.
trans-unit.target: 此範例顯示如何具現化 `Select` 子句中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The code first defines a new class with a constructor, and then modifies the `Select` statement so that the expression is a new instance of the new class.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼會先利用建構函式定義新的類別，然後修改 `Select` 陳述式，讓運算式成為新類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the following XML document: [Sample XML File: Typical Purchase Order (LINQ to XML)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/sample-xml-file-typical-purchase-order-linq-to-xml.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用下列 XML 文件︰[範例 XML 檔︰ 典型採購訂單 (LINQ to XML)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/sample-xml-file-typical-purchase-order-linq-to-xml.md)。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `M:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Element` method that was introduced in the topic [How to: Retrieve a Single Child Element (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-retrieve-a-single-child-element-linq-to-xml.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`M:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Element`引進 > 主題中的方法[How to︰ 擷取單一子項目 (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-retrieve-a-single-child-element-linq-to-xml.md)。

trans-unit.source: It also uses casts to retrieve the values of the elements that are returned by the `M:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Element` method.
trans-unit.target: 它也會使用轉換以擷取 `M:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Element` 方法所傳回的元素值。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會產生下列輸出：
